Gildeoni Prioli

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/3528677684727015
  • Última atualização do currículo em 18/06/2012

Degree in Mechanical Industrial Engineering, in 1997. Doctorate in Progress {Ph.D Stricto Sensu} at the University of São Paulo - FMUSP. Is Postgraduate Master in Science - M.Sc. at University of São Paulo - FMUSP, 2007; also concluded the Professional Master's Degree - M.B.A. in Management and Engineering of Products and Services at Polytechnic School, University of São Paulo - EPUSP, 2003. Has Postgraduate (a Specialist Certificate) in Industrial Refrigeration & Air Conditioning, at Faculty of Industrial Engineering (FEI) - São Bernardo of Campo-SP, 1999. Has a Specialist Certificate in Plastic Materials or Polymers (Technical in Plastics) at Technology Center, School SENAI Mario Amato of São Bernardo of Campo - SP, Student Scholarship at FIESP, 2004. Has a Specialist Certificate in Thermal Energy (Technical in Thermal Energy) at Technology Center, School SENAI Oscar Rodrigues Alves of São Paulo - SP, Student Scholarship at FIESP, 2009, and also Specialist Technician in Electromechanical at ETESP of São Paulo - SP , 1986. Completed the Course in Fluid Mechanics at Santa Cecilia University, 1998. Currently Studied and Cloncluded, Specialist in Electronic, on the Technology Center of School SENAI Conde José de Azevedo of São Paulo - SP; Student Scholarship at FIESP, 2010-11. Please check all courses and training completed ON THIS PAGE . OBJECTIVES: 1) Always carry the Profession of Engineer in the Automotive-Auto Parts. 2) Also in Project Development of Thermal Energy and Thermodynamics: the Maintenance of Air Conditioning of Vehicles (Automobiles), Industrial-Commercial Refrigeration Systems; Systems of Air Conditioning and Heating, Industrial Ventilation to Exhaust and Dilution Noxious Gases - HVAC. 3) Participates in Study Group: Projects of the Laboratory of Experimental Air Pollution (LPAE), School of Medicine, University of São Paulo. As a researcher and assistant, I want to continue working under the leadership of Ph.Dr.: Paulo SALDIVA; in Projects and Studies with Objective to Reduce the Pollution and Improve Collective Health of Children and Elderly. 4) and simultaneously working as teacher to pass knowledge and experienced in 15 years in Industry and Schools Recognized. Thank You. (Texto informado pelo autor)
